entry.summary: RTâ€‚Accelchain Re For example: @developer_dao is a DAO whose affiliation is mainly taken by developers in the web3 space. How to get into the DAO? Get the governance token of the DAO. In this case the governance token of Developer Dao is $code. Voila, you can now take part in their projects.

entry.title: Re Biconomy is a multichain relayer protocol founded by @AraBalaghi @@aniket_jindal08 @schin_tomar. Their mission is to improve the user onboarding an...
entry.summary: Re Biconomy is a multichain relayer protocol founded by @AraBalaghi @@aniket_jindal08 @schin_tomar. Their mission is to improve the user onboarding and transaction experience on dapps by making them as intuitive and easy to use as web2 products.
